name: Fast Food Truck Park Chef Game
name_original: Fast Food Truck Park Chef Game
description:
My Fast Food Truck Park Cooking Game

Hello Everyone, are you crazy cooking chef? Then come in my truck park cooking games and fast food games.

Here is brand new concept of fast food truck chef master. That you are also known as Street Food Kitchen cooking master. With this cooking game, you can fill like the owner of restaurant and play kitchen fun cooking game. You just have to do is fulfil customers requirement of fast food at you own truck park, by taking meal orders in this restaurant food game. Cook delicious meals and snacks for hungry customers by serving best time made by you in kitchen. Be a like master chef in fast food, And cook meals as per your toughness and service to the customer with different kinds of foods, available as a street foods. This Fast Food cooking and baking game helps you to cook and prepare the healthiest, most delicious high quality fast food.

Cook tasty and healthy fast food in the American city streets to serve the hungry customers. Be the master chef to have the best street food truck park in the town. Enjoy your own restaurant story at fast food truck festival and Carnival at your town. You can serve best to your customers from high school like lunchbox food chef.

What are the Items you can Cook here:
1. Sandwich
Here you can decorate and made sandwich with different types of items and sauces.
2. Burger
Burger is most common fast food or street food, you can made it with different types of layers with vary items and sauces.
3. Hotdog
Hot dog is street food, you can made it easily with different types of items and sauces.
4. Pizza
Yummy Pizza with drink is dreamed fast food, you can made it easily with different types of items and sauces. Then bake it and serve it.
5. Ice-Cream
Yummy! Ice cream, you can serve best with cone and cup. With different types of ingredient and toppings.

Features:
- Easy tap and drag game play
- Many ingredients to choose from, just like in a real shop: bread, cheese, crispy, ham patties, lettuce, onions, pickles, sausages and much more.
- A fast food court in top area
- Amazing graphics and sound effects
- Take meal orders from customers and serve best
- Serve hungry customers in your food truck park
- Customisable items to give the customer, the look you want
- Cook yummy burgers, pizza, hotdog, sandwich with this kitchen chef fever game
- serve items with ice creams in this street food cooking stand game
- Serve weird and funny customers
- Enjoy and fun with cool cooking & baking in fast food maker game
- Have fun with different Truck park shops :
Burger Shop,
Pizza Shop,
Sandwich Shop,
Hotdog Shop,
Ice-cream truck shop.
- Enjoy meal at this street kitchen cooking game
- Make best tastes to the customer, they are ready for them to eat.
- Select ingredients and cook your food to make the perfect items.
- Fulfil multiple orders in the day to make happy customers.
- Endless food cooking fun.


My Fast Food Truck Park Cooking Game is one of the best free cooking games for whom they love to cook.
